remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法包装对的调用构造函数。The method wraps a call to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 有关预定义的区域性名称的列表，请参阅[区域语言支持 (NLS) API 参考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)转全局开发人员中心。For a list of predefined culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 此外，从 Windows 10 开始`name`可以是任何有效的 bcp-47 语言标记。In addition, starting with Windows 10, `name` can be any valid BCP-47 language tag. 区域性分为三个集合： 固定区域性，非特定区域性和特定区域性。Cultures are grouped into three sets: the invariant culture, the neutral cultures, and the specific cultures. 有关详细信息，请参阅说明类。For more information, see the description of the class. 如果此方法返回的特定区域性的区域性标识符与当前的 Windows 区域性的区域性标识符匹配，此方法将创建使用 Windows 区域性的对象重写。If the culture identifier of the specific culture returned by this method matches the culture identifier of the current Windows culture, this method creates a object that uses the Windows culture overrides. 重写包括的属性的用户设置返回对象属性和返回对象属性。The overrides include user settings for the properties of the object returned by the property and the object returned by the property. 若要实例化对象，使用默认区域性设置而不是用户重写时，调用构造函数的值与`false`为`useUserOverride`自变量。To instantiate a object that with default culture settings rather than user overrides, call the constructor with a value of `false` for the `useUserOverride` argument. 尽管方法名称中包含词"特定"，请记住，区域性数据可能会更改之间的版本中，或由于自定义区域性，或由于用户重写。Although the method name includes the term "Specific", remember that culture data can change between versions, or due to custom cultures, or because of user overrides. 有关将数据保存使用固定区域性或二进制或固定的窗体。Use the invariant culture or binary or fixed forms for saving data. ## Examples 下面的示例检索的数组表示从非特定区域性的对象方法并对数组进行排序。The following example retrieves an array of objects that represent neutral cultures from the method and sorts the array. 当它循环访问数组中的元素时，它将传递到每个非特定区域性的名称方法，并显示该方法返回的特定区域性的名称。When it iterates the elements in the array, it passes the name of each neutral culture to the method and displays the name of the specific culture returned by the method. > [!NOTE] > 该示例使用 ZH-CHS 和 ZH-CHT 区域性名称。The example uses the zh-CHS and zh-CHT culture names. 但是，针对 Windows Vista 和更高版本应使用中文 Hans 而不是 ZH-CHS 和而不是 ZH-CHT 此不同的应用程序。However, applications that target Windows Vista and later should use zh-Hans instead of zh-CHS and zh-Hant instead of zh-CHT. 中文 Hans 和此不同表示当前的标准，应能除非你有使用较旧名称的原因。zh-Hans and zh-Hant represent the current standard and should be used unless you have a reason for using the older names. > > 另请注意，该示例的结果可能不同的繁体中文 Windows 中，其中的中文 （繁体） 非特定区域性 （中文、 ZH-CHT 或此不同） 的输入将返回 ZH-TW 安装的程序上。Note also that the results of the example may differ on an installation of Taiwanese Windows, where the input of a Chinese (Traditional) neutral culture (zh, zh-CHT, or zh-Hant) will return zh-TW. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的对象及其关联的对象确定的日期的默认格式、 时间、 数字、 货币值，排序顺序的文本、 大小写约定，和的字符串比较。The object that is returned by this property and its associated objects determine the default format for dates, times, numbers, currency values, the sorting order of text, casing conventions, and string comparisons. 当前的区域性是执行线程，返回的静态属性属性。The current culture is a property of the executing thread, which is returned by the static property. 值属性的值对应属性。The value of the property corresponds to the value of the property. 检索的值的属性等效于检索返回对象`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to retrieving the object returned by the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，设置的值属性也会更改当前线程区域性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], setting the value of the property also changes the current thread culture. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及早期版本中，属性是只读的; 也就是说，你可以检索属性值，但不能将其设置。In the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and earlier versions, the property is read-only; that is, you can retrieve the property value, but you cannot set it. 若要更改当前区域性，则分配对象，表示新区域性`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性。To change the current culture, you assign the object that represents the new culture to the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]、属性为读写; 你可以设置和检索属性的值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the property is read-write; you can both set and retrieve the property's value. 如果属性值设置表示该新区域性中的值的对象`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性也会更改。If you do set the property value to a object that represents a new culture, the value of the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property also changes. 本节内容：In this section: [如何确定线程的区域性](#ThreadCulture) [How a Thread's Culture Is Determined](#ThreadCulture) [获取当前区域性](#Getting) [Getting the Current Culture](#Getting) [显式设置 CurrentCulture 属性](#ExplicitSetting) [Explicitly Setting the CurrentCulture Property](#ExplicitSetting) [当前区域性和用户重写](#Overrides) [The Current Culture and User Overrides](#Overrides) [区域性和 Windows 应用Culture and Windows Apps](#WindowsAndCurr) ## 如何确定线程的区域性How a Thread's Culture Is Determined 线程启动时，其区域性最初，如下所示确定：When a thread is started, its culture is initially determined as follows: - 通过检索由指定的区域性线程正在其中执行，如果属性值不是应用程序域中的属性`null`。By retrieving the culture that is specified by the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing, if the property value is not `null`. - 如果线程正在执行的基于任务的异步操作和应用面向一个线程池线程[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本的.NET Framework 中，其区域性由调用线程的区域性。If the thread is a thread pool thread that is executing a task-based asynchronous operation and the app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version of the .NET Framework, its culture is determined by the culture of the calling thread. 下面的示例将当前区域性更改为葡萄牙语 （巴西），并启动六项任务，其中每个显示其线程 ID、 任务 ID、 和其当前区域性。The following example changes the current culture to Portuguese (Brazil) and launches six tasks, each of which displays its thread ID, its task ID, and its current culture. 每个任务 （和线程） 已继承调用线程的区域性。Each of the tasks (and the threads) has inherited the culture of the calling thread. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/Async1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/Async1.vb#14)] 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. - 通过调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数。By calling the Windows `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function. 请注意，是否你设置特定区域性之外的系统安装的区域性或用户的首选的区域性，并且你的应用程序启动多个线程，这些线程的当前区域性将通过返回的区域性`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数，除非你为其分配区域性线程正在执行的应用程序域的属性。Note that if you set a specific culture that is different from the system-installed culture or the user's preferred culture, and your application starts multiple threads, the current culture of those threads will be the culture that is returned by the `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function, unless you assign a culture to the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing. 有关如何确定线程的区域性的详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和线程"部分引用页。For more information about how the culture of a thread is determined, see the "Culture and threads" section in the reference page. ## 获取当前区域性Getting the Current Culture 属性是在每个线程设置; 也就是说，每个线程可以具有它自己的区域性。The property is a per-thread setting; that is, each thread can have its own culture. 通过检索的值的获取当前线程的区域性属性，如下面的示例演示。You get the culture of the current thread by retrieving the value of the property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/Get1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/Get1.vb#5)] 您还可以检索的值从当前线程的区域性属性。You can also retrieve the value of the current thread's culture from the property. ## 显式设置 CurrentCulture 属性Explicitly Setting the CurrentCulture Property 着手[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，若要更改的现有线程，使用的区域性设置为新的区域性属性。Staring with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], to change the culture that is used by an existing thread, you set the property to the new culture. 如果你显式更改这种方式，更改线程的区域性仍然存在，如果线程跨越应用程序域边界。If you explicitly change a thread's culture in this way, that change persists if the thread crosses application domain boundaries. 下面的示例将当前的线程区域性更改为荷兰语 （荷兰）。The following example changes the current thread culture to Dutch (Netherlands). 它还显示，当当前线程跨越应用程序域边界，其当前区域性保持已更改。It also shows that, when the current thread crosses application domain boundaries, its current culture remains changed. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/cs/changeculture11.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentculture/vb/changeculture11.vb#11)] > [!NOTE] > 通过更改区域性属性需要具有权限值设置。Changing the culture by using the property requires a permission with the value set. 由于与线程关联的安全状态，对线程进行操作很危险。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，仅对可信的代码，并且仅在必要的时候，则应授予此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only to trustworthy code, and then only as necessary. 无法更改在不完全受信任的代码中的线程区域性。You cannot change thread culture in semi-trusted code. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，你可以将当前线程区域性显式更改为特定区域性 （如法语 （加拿大）） 或非特定区域性 （如法语）。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you can explicitly change the current thread culture to either a specific culture (such as French (Canada)) or a neutral culture (such as French). 当对象表示非特定区域性的值属性，如， ， ， ，和反映与关联的特定区域性非特定区域性。When a object represents a neutral culture, the values of properties such as , , , , and reflect the specific culture that is associated with the neutral culture. 例如，英语的非特定区域性基准区域性为英语 （美国）;德语区域性的基准区域性为德语 （德国）。For example, the dominant culture for the English neutral culture is English (United States); the dominant culture for the German culture is German (Germany). 下面的示例演示了差异在格式设置时的当前区域性设置为特定区域性、 法语 （加拿大） 和非特定区域性，法语。The following example illustrates the difference in formatting when the current culture is set to a specific culture, French (Canada), and a neutral culture, French. 当前区域性和用户重写The Current Culture and User Overrides Windows 允许用户重写的标准属性值对象和其关联的对象，通过使用**区域和语言选项**控制面板中。Windows allows users to override the standard property values of the object and its associated objects by using **Regional and Language Options** in Control Panel. 返回对象属性反映这些用户替代在以下情况：The object returned by the property reflects these user overrides in the following cases: - 如果当前线程区域性由 Windows 隐式设置`GetUserDefaultLocaleName`函数。If the current thread culture is set implicitly by the Windows `GetUserDefaultLocaleName` function. - 如果当前线程区域性定义属性对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域性。If the current thread culture defined by the property corresponds to the current Windows system culture. - 如果当前线程区域性将显式设置为返回的区域性方法，并且区域性都对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域性。If the current thread culture is set explicitly to a culture returned by the method, and that culture corresponds to the current Windows system culture. - 如果当前线程区域性将显式设置为通过实例化区域性构造函数，并且区域性对应于当前的 Windows 系统区域性。If the current thread culture is set explicitly to a culture instantiated by the constructor, and that culture corresponds to the current Windows system culture. 在某些情况下，特别是对于服务器应用程序，将当前区域性设置为反映用户替代的对象可能不是很理想。In some cases, particularly for server applications, setting the current culture to a object that reflects user overrides may be undesirable. 相反，你可以将当前线程区域性设置为对象不会反映用户在通过以下方式中重写：Instead, you can set the current thread culture to a object that does not reflect user overrides in the following ways: - 通过调用构造函数的值与`false`为`useUserOverride`自变量。By calling the constructor with a value of `false` for the `useUserOverride` argument. - 通过调用方法，它返回缓存，只读对象。By calling the method, which returns a cached, read-only object. ## 当前区域性和 UWP 应用The current culture and UWP apps 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，属性是读写的就像.NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序中一样; 你可以获取和设置当前区域性使用它。In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the property is read-write, just as it is in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps; you can use it both to get and to set the current culture. 但是，UWP 应用不区分当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性。However, UWP apps do not distinguish between the current culture and the current UI culture. 和属性映射到中的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。The and properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection. 在.NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序，当前区域性为每个线程设置，和属性反映当前线程的区域性。In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current culture is a per-thread setting, and the property reflects the culture of the current thread only. 在 UWP 应用中，当前区域性映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)属性，它是一种全局设置。In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) property, which is a global setting. 设置属性更改整个应用程序的区域性; 无法在每个线程基础上设置区域性。Setting the property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前 UI 区域性是每个线程的属性。The current UI culture is a per-thread property. 也就是说，每个线程具有其自己的当前 UI 区域性。That is, each thread has its own current UI culture. 此属性等效于检索，或者启动具有[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则设置对象分配给`System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture`属性。This property is equivalent to retrieving or, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], setting the object assigned to the `System.Threading.Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture` property. 线程启动时，其用户界面区域性最初，如下所示确定：When a thread is started, its UI culture is initially determined as follows: - 通过检索由指定的区域性线程正在其中执行，如果属性值不是应用程序域中的属性`null`。By retrieving the culture that is specified by the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing, if the property value is not `null`. - 如果线程正在执行的基于任务的异步操作和应用面向一个线程池线程[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本的.NET Framework 中，其用户界面区域性由调用线程的 UI 区域性。If the thread is a thread pool thread that is executing a task-based asynchronous operation and the app targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version of the .NET Framework, its UI culture is determined by the UI culture of the calling thread. 下面的示例将当前 UI 区域性更改为葡萄牙语 （巴西），并启动六项任务，其中每个显示其线程 ID、 任务 ID、 和其当前 UI 区域性。The following example changes the current UI culture to Portuguese (Brazil) and launches six tasks, each of which displays its thread ID, its task ID, and its current UI culture. 每个任务 （和线程） 已继承调用线程的 UI 区域性。Each of the tasks (and the threads) has inherited the UI culture of the calling thread. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/Async1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/Async1.vb#14)] 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"区域性和基于任务的异步操作"部分主题。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. - 通过调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数。By calling the Windows `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)]、属性是只读的。In the [!INCLUDE[Compact](~/includes/compact-md.md)], the property is read-only. 当前 UI 区域性由系统的区域设置，并且不能以编程方式更改。The current UI culture is determined by the system's regional settings and cannot be changed programmatically. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，若要更改的用户接口区域性使用线程，设置为新的区域性属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], to change the user interface culture used by a thread, set the property to the new culture. 如果你显式更改这种方式，更改线程的 UI 区域性仍然存在，如果线程跨越应用程序域边界。If you explicitly change a thread's UI culture in this way, that change persists if the thread crosses application domain boundaries. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 4.5.2 及早期版本中，属性是只读的; 也就是说，你可以检索属性值，但不能将其设置。In the .NET Framework 4.5.2 and earlier versions, the property is read-only; that is, you can retrieve the property value, but you cannot set it. 若要更改当前 UI 区域性，则分配对象以表示新的 UI 区域性到`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture`属性。To change the current UI culture, you assign the object that represents the new UI culture to the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentUICulture` property. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]、属性为读写; 你可以设置和检索属性的值。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the property is read-write; you can both set and retrieve the property's value. 如果属性值设置表示该新区域性中的值的对象`Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture`属性也会更改。If you do set the property value to a object that represents a new culture, the value of the `Thread.CurrentThread.CurrentCulture` property also changes. 本节内容：In this section: [获取当前 UI 区域性](#Getting) [Getting the Current UI Culture](#Getting) [显式设置的当前 UI 区域性](#Explicit) [Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture](#Explicit) [隐式设置当前 UI 区域性](#Implicit) [Implicitly Setting the Current UI Culture](#Implicit) [安全注意事项](#Security) [Security Considerations](#Security) [当前的 UI 区域性和 Windows 应用程序The Current UI Culture and Windows apps](#WindowsAndCurrUI) ## 获取当前 UI 区域性Getting the Current UI Culture 属性是在每个线程设置; 也就是说，每个线程可以具有其自己的 UI 区域性。The property is a per-thread setting; that is, each thread can have its own UI culture. 通过检索的值的获取当前线程的 UI 区域性属性，如下面的示例演示。You get the UI culture of the current thread by retrieving the value of the property, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/Get1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/Get1.vb#5)] 您还可以检索的值从当前线程的 UI 区域性属性。You can also retrieve the value of the current thread's UI culture from the property. ## 显式设置的当前 UI 区域性Explicitly Setting the Current UI Culture 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，你可以通过分配更改当前 UI 区域性对象，表示新区域性属性。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], you can change the current UI culture by assigning a object that represents the new culture to the property. 可以将设置当前 UI 区域性，为任一特定区域性 （例如 EN-US 或 DE-DE） 或非特定区域性 （例如 en 或 de）。The current UI culture can be set to either a specific culture (such as en-US or de-DE) or to a neutral culture (such as en or de). 下面的示例将当前 UI 区域性设置为 FR-FR 或法语 （法国）。The following example sets the current UI culture to fr-FR or French (France). [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/cs/currentuiculture1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.cultureinfo.currentuiculture/vb/currentuiculture1.vb#1)] 在多线程应用程序中，你可以显式设置的任何线程的 UI 区域性通过分配对象以表示该区域性到线程的属性。In a multithreaded application, you can explicitly set the UI culture of any thread by assigning a object that represents that culture to the thread's property. 如果线程你想要设置其区域性是当前线程，则可以分配到的新区域性属性。If the thread whose culture you want to set is the current thread, you can assign the new culture to the property. 当显式设置线程的 UI 区域性，线程保留相同的区域性，即使它是跨应用程序域边界的并在另一个应用程序域中执行代码。When the UI culture of a thread is set explicitly, that thread retains the same culture even if it crosses application domain boundaries and executes code in another application domain. ## 隐式设置当前 UI 区域性Implicitly Setting the Current UI Culture 默认情况下，如下所示设置其当前的 UI 区域性中第一个线程，包括主应用程序线程时创建:When a thread, including the main application thread, is first created, by default its current UI culture is set as follows: - 通过使用由定义的区域性如果属性值不是当前的应用程序域的属性`null`。By using the culture defined by the property for the current application domain if the property value is not `null`. - 通过使用系统的默认区域性。By using the system's default culture. 在系统上使用 Windows 操作系统，公共语言运行时调用 Windows`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数可设置的当前 UI 区域性。On systems that use the Windows operating system, the common language runtime calls the Windows `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function to set the current UI culture. `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` 返回由用户设置的默认 UI 区域性。`GetUserDefaultUILanguage` returns the default UI culture set by the user. 如果用户未设置默认用户界面语言，则返回最初在系统上安装的区域性。If the user has not set a default UI language, it returns the culture originally installed on the system. 如果线程是跨应用程序边界的并在另一个应用程序域中执行代码，其区域性确定与新创建的线程的相同的方式。If the thread crosses application boundaries and executes code in another application domain, its culture is determined in the same way as that of a newly created thread. 请注意，是否你设置不同于系统安装 UI 区域性特定的 UI 区域性或用户的首选 UI 区域性，并且你的应用程序启动多个线程，这些线程的当前 UI 区域性将由区域性`GetUserDefaultUILanguage`函数，除非你为其分配区域性线程正在执行的应用程序域的属性。Note that if you set a specific UI culture that is different from the system-installed UI culture or the user's preferred UI culture, and your application starts multiple threads, the current UI culture of those threads will be the culture returned by the `GetUserDefaultUILanguage` function, unless you assign a culture to the property in the application domain in which the thread is executing. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 更改当前线程的区域性，则需要具有权限值设置。Changing the culture of the current thread requires a permission with the value set. > [!CAUTION] > 由于与线程关联的安全状态，对线程进行操作很危险。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，仅对可信的代码，并且仅在必要的时候，则应授予此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only to trustworthy code, and then only as necessary. 无法更改在不完全受信任的代码中的线程区域性。You cannot change thread culture in semi-trusted code. ## 当前 UI 区域性和 UWP 应用The current UI culture and UWP apps 在通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用中，属性是读写的就像.NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序中一样; 你可以获取和设置当前区域性使用它。In Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps, the property is read-write, just as it is in .NET Framework and .NET Core apps; you can use it both to get and to set the current culture. 但是，UWP 应用不区分当前区域性和当前 UI 区域性。However, UWP apps do not distinguish between the current culture and the current UI culture. 和属性映射到中的第一个值[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)集合。The and properties map to the first value in the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) collection. .NET Framework 和.NET 核心应用程序，在当前 UI 区域性为每个线程设置，和属性反映当前线程的 UI 区域性。In .NET Framework and .NET Core apps, the current UI culture is a per-thread setting, and the property reflects the UI culture of the current thread only. 在 UWP 应用中，当前区域性映射到[Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_)属性，它是一种全局设置。In UWP apps, the current culture maps to the [Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Core.ResourceManager.DefaultContext.Languages](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.applicationmodel.resources.core.resourcecontext#properties_) property, which is a global setting. 设置属性更改整个应用程序的区域性; 无法在每个线程基础上设置区域性。Setting the property changes the culture of the entire app; culture cannot be set on a per-thread basis. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和早期版本中，默认情况下，所有线程的区域性设置为 Windows 系统区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and previous versions, by default, the culture of all threads is set to the Windows system culture. 对于当前区域性不同于默认系统区域性的应用程序，此行为通常是不可取的。For applications whose current culture differs from the default system culture, this behavior is often undesirable. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、属性可让应用程序定义应用程序域中的所有线程的默认区域性。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the property enables an application to define the default culture of all threads in an application domain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果未显式设置的区域性的任何现有线程执行应用程序域中，设置属性也会更改这些线程的区域性。If you have not explicitly set the culture of any existing threads executing in an application domain, setting the property also changes the culture of these threads. 但是，如果在另一个应用程序域中执行这些线程，则其区域性定义通过该应用程序域中的属性或如果没有定义默认值是，通过默认系统区域性。However, if these threads execute in another application domain, their culture is defined by the property in that application domain or, if no default value is defined, by the default system culture. 因此，我们建议你始终显式设置你的主应用程序线程的区域性，并不依赖于属性来定义主应用程序线程的区域性。Because of this, we recommend that you always explicitly set the culture of your main application thread, and not rely on the property to define the culture of the main application thread. 除非它已显式设置的值属性是`null`，并且尚未分配显式区域性应用程序域中的线程的区域性不由默认 Windows 系统区域性。Unless it is set explicitly, the value of the property is `null`, and the culture of threads in an application domain that have not been assigned an explicit culture is defined by the default Windows system culture. 有关区域性、 线程和应用程序域的详细信息，请参阅"区域性和线程"和"区域性和应用程序域"部分中引用页。For more information about cultures, threads, and application domains, see the "Culture and threads" and "Culture and application domains" sections in the reference page. ## 字符串操作String Operations 你可以使用固定区域性进行区分区域性的字符串操作不受当前线程区域性的约定和的区域性间都一致。You can use the invariant culture for culture-sensitive string operations that are not affected by the conventions of the current thread culture and that are consistent across cultures. 例如，你可能想要固定的顺序进行显示或适用于无论当前线程区域性的字符串的一组标准的大小写约定的已排序的数据。For example, you may want sorted data to appear in a fixed order or apply a standard set of casing conventions to strings regardless of the current thread culture. 若要执行此操作，将传递对象的方法的具有参数，如和。To do this, you pass the object to a method that has a parameter, such as and . ##
